Error.VisitorCountUpperLimit: Value should be smaller than the visitor count.
Label.MaxPlayerDescription: The maximum number of people allowed in one instance of the experience.
Label.RobloxOptimizedDescription: Roblox will fill your server to optimize for the best experience.
Label.DisableDescription: Choosing this option may result in a decrease in gameplay time and Robux earned.
Label.CustomizeDescription: Customizing social slots reserved for friends of the players in the server.
Message.HasPlaceOverrideInfo: You’ve made an exception for this place.
Message.NonrootPlaceToggleInfo: Allows users to skip the start place and join this place directly through matchmaking, teleports, server lists, or following friends. This setting is overridden if this place is designated as the landing spot for an event.
Label.AllowDirectJoins: Allow direct access to this place
Description.ClearJoinRestrictionsOverrid: Your overall setting for Direct Access to Places will apply instead
